title: Apple streusel pie
ingredients: ['For the Pastry', '300g plain flour', '150g unsalted butter', '100g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'rum essence', 'For the Filling', '500g quark', '30g unsalted butter, melted', '2 tablespoons sugar', '5-7 apples', 'For the Streusel', '200g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '100g unsalted butter']
